title: Students in a ‘Hostile Environment’
sub_head: A public school teacher challenges critical race theory.
body:
Sometimes all it takes is one great teacher to turn young lives around. In Providence, R.I., the question is whether the radicals who run public education will prevent one very courageous teacher from serving children in need. This week brings news of the pressure brought to bear on educators who refuse to toe the ideological line.
